#define inchar getchar_unlocked

inline void inp( int &n )
{
n=0;
int ch=inchar();int sign=1;
while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){if(ch=='-')sign=-1; ch=inchar();}
while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=inchar();
n=n*sign;
}


int main() {

    int test;
    inp(test);
    int dp[10005],a[10005],dc[10005];
    while(test--)
     {
        
         int n;
         inp(n);
         for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
          inp(a[i]);
         dp[1] = 1;
         dc[1] = 1;
         int ans = 1;
         for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
          {
              dp[i] = 1;
              dc[i] = 1;
              for(int j=1;j<i;j++)
               {
                   
                   if(a[j]<a[i])
                    dp[i] = max(dp[i],dp[j]+1);
                   else if(a[j]>a[i])
                    dc[i] = max(dc[i],dc[j]+1);
                   ans = max(ans,dp[i]);    
                   ans = max(ans,dc[i]);
                  
               }
              //  cout<<i<<" "<<dp[i]<<endl;
          }
          printf("%d\n",ans);
         
     }
    
    
    
    //getchar();
    //getchar();
	return 0;
}
